name: Storms of Shambhala
description: Storms of Shambhala is a mythological deck-building card game. It has an amazing combination of deck-building, city building, and strategic elements. With the ability to produce four types of resources (attack, wisdom, gold, and magic), the game allows for a huge range of creative strategies.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1 GHZ Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 128 MB Storage: 700 MB available space Additional Notes: OpenGL (ES) 2.0+
